ValidationRule.description: If CIF type is DIRECT BUYER the please fill the following fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(CIF_Type__c, "DIRECT BUYER"), OR( ISBLANK(NAME_OF_THE_OWNER__c), (AND( ISBLANK(Mobile__c), ISBLANK(E_MAIL__c) )), ISBLANK(TEXT(CIF_Lead_Source__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PLEASE FILL ALL THE FIELDS MENTIONED IN THE BUYER REQUIRED DETAILS SECTION.
